text:
Hey! Friends it’s time to wear your party
shoes practice those dance moves and welcome

the New Year . Well I’m sure 2015 was a
great year for all you people out there. And

we really want to thank you for watching all
our lessons and learning from them. So what’s

new in 2016? Well, we have a wonderful New
Year’s gift for you and what is that gift?

We are coming up with our new channel which
is Skillopedia. Skillopedia, so what exactly

is Skillopedia? Well, here you will learn
lot of skills; skills related to communication,

business skills and interpersonal skills,
something to enhance your personality or even

to handle those dirty tricky politics. How
do you do that? How do you manage these things?

So all these things you are gonna learn with
our new channel Skillopedia. So what are you

waiting for? Go ahead and subscribe, we will
be going live in the first week of January.
So stay tuned and wish you a very Happy New Year!!!
